data.name: Bloodhound
data.detailed_description:
Follow us and don't miss exclusive content!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1926270/Bloodhound/


DISCORD! o7


About the Game



The cult of Astaroth summoned the dark forces of Hell. You have to stop them and your guns will help you. Fight the cultists and demons and try to stop Astaroth from coming to Earth. Enjoy a Fresh Look & Old Fun in this arcade horror FPS game inspired by the legends of the 90s.



Bloodhound tells the story of a member of the Order of Keepers of the Gates, tasked with guarding the gates of Hell. Unfortunately, the Cult of Astaroth stands in their way. The Cult wants to open the gates and let the spawn of evil through them. All of this is in the name of Astaroth, the lord of the Abyss, so she can walk the earth and wreak havoc once more. You must stop the Satanists and get rid of any creatures they summon, Destroy the Cult before they can bring back their Lord



A game for fans of fast and fleshy gameplay.
We combine gameplay mechanics from the most iconic games of the genre from the 90s and 00s and add our own fresh ideas to create a unique FPS gameplay experience.

Hellish locations inspired by cult horror movies and real places
In each act of our game, you will move between the warped real world and an alternative hellish reality.



Face the army of Hell with 15 unique enemies and 4 devastating Hell bosses.



Destructive Weapons - arsenal with the machete, shotgun, double-barreled shotgun, assault rifle, crossbow, rocket launcher, a chainsaw with a flamethrower, and a railgun!



Brutal Enemy damage system: choose a weapon suited to the situation and deal with anyone who stands in your way unscrupulously. Use a powerful firearm, thanks to which you are able to execute cultists or demons, try a chainsaw with a flamethrower, or… Have you ever fired two miniguns at once?



Show them a resistance that no one has considered. Feel the unique combination of mobility and firepower in indecently engaging gameplay.


Slaughter your opponents, there is no shield system or regeneration during combat, so grab your guns, collect upgrades, and don't take your fingers off the triggers!


  • Arcade Horror First Person Shooter
  • Singleplayer with a linear story
  • Badass hero
  • 10 fancy & deadly weapons
  • 15 unique enemies and 4 bosses
  • 4 adrenaline-filled acts
  • Satisfying combat gameplay
  • Hellish locations inspired by cult horror movies and real places
  • Melodic instrumental metal from the band Sons of Amon
  • Feel like in heaven smashing demons
  • Powered by Unreal Engine 4®

data.short_description: Crush the cult of Astaroth and vanquish her hellspawn, make them squeal and hide where they came from. Enjoy a Fresh Look & Old Fun in this arcade horror FPS game inspired by the legends of the 90s.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R)Core(TM) i5-2500K CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9750H CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

Minimum:
